channel.title: Exp level requirements & max item amount
channel.description:
yes, the title may sound a little confusing, but i'm not too sure how to word it.
in runescape in order to have a 99 skill you need 14300000m exp or something like that...in czar is a lot less...how do i fix it...?
and another question, how do i change the max item?
